title: 79/46/EEC: Commission Decision of 8 December 1978 on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in Ireland pursuant to Title II of Directive 75/268/EEC (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 8 December 1978  on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in Ireland pursuant to Title II of Directive 75/268/EEC  (Only the English text is authentic)  (79/46/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The existing provisions in Ireland for the implementation of Title II of Directive 75/268/EEC in 1978 satisfy the conditions for financial contribution by the Community towards common measures as referred to in Article 13 of Directive 75/268/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to Ireland.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 December 1978.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No L 128, 19.5.1975, p. 1. (2)OJ No L 96, 23.4.1972, p. 1. (3)OJ No L 302, 4.11.1976, p. 19. (4)OJ No L 145, 13.6.1977, p. 43.
